Config.Name: sync source
Config.Description: Source Folder to sync to a remote cryfs location

Config.Name: appdata
Config.Description: App data location. This is very important if you ever need to move to a new cryfs location. Without the config file you will be unable to decrypt

Config.Name: Destination Folder
Config.Description: This is the base for the cryfs mount. This will contain all the encrypted files.

Config.Name: Cryfs Password
Config.Description: Password for cryfs. Do not lose. Files will not be recoverable
